The US sprayed carcinogenic pesticides on California grape harvesters decades ago. The same systemic pesticide in Canada is regulated to not be applied for at least three weeks prior to harvest. The USA without warning to parents or other adults, aerial spray above pedestrians on side walks & childrens school grounds. Lowest cancer rates are Canadian Inuit & Japanese people due to high consumption of fresh seafoods. Those statistics could now be different since fukashima

Remarkable, the indigenous Africans in their native Egypt with cradles of civilisation over 10,000 years ago along the African River Nile - language, writing, science, engineering & culture. And most importantly the associated social engineering to achieve civilisation whilst most of the rest of the world were eking out a living as barbaric nomadic hunters & gatherers. Alien incursions & invasions starting with the Italian Roman Natives, Persian Natives, Arab Natives, & Western European Natives have all but destroyed the nucleus of civilization & the once great Native Africans.

Dear Santa, please don't bother visiting the Netherlands this Xmas. The one and only Sinterklaas already brought us tons of presents on December 5th. You know we consider you a cheep Cola-copy anyway. Apart from that, the reindeer-stuff you do is cool. But please give the Dutch present to the children in Syria and Jemen

Seaworld has not taken animals from the wild in over 30 years. Management has changed three times since then. Look at what they stand for now.. Conservation and rescue. The parks help fund that.. I think they do way more good than bad and the media sensationalizes the extremists point of view. Let's all look at the big picture here. Where would we be without Seaworld?
